Name: Treacle No.2
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STIR half the rum with two ice cubes in a chilled glass.
Add PX sherry, sugar syrup, bitters, and two more ice cubes.
STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum.
STIR some more and add more ice.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Made to appeal to drinkers who want a cocktail that tastes like Treacle. And it does.
History: Adapted from a 2011 rework of Dick Bradsell 's original Treacle by Fraser Campbell at The Alchemist Bar in Melbourne, Australia.
Nutrition: One serving of Treacle No.2 contains 208 calories
